Plot LC block weights with 95% CIs from a GraphLearner (or legacy inputs)

Source: R/mbspls_plot_block_weight_ci.R
mbspls_plot_block_weight_ci.Rd

Plot LC block weights with 95% CIs from a GraphLearner (or legacy inputs)

mbspls_plot_block_weight_ci(
  x,
  source = c("weights", "bootstrap"),
  ci_filter = c("none", "excludes_zero", "overlaps_zero"),
  top_n = NULL,
  add_block_rule = TRUE,
  font = "sans",
  alpha_by_stability = TRUE
)

Arguments

x

Either:

  • a trained GraphLearner built with mbspls_graph_learner() (recommended), or

  • a list like list(mbspls = <pipeop or state>, mbspls_bootstrap_select = <pipeop or state>), or your previous c(glearner$model$mbspls, glearner$model$mbspls_bootstrap_select).

source

One of c("weights","bootstrap").

  • "bootstrap": uses aligned summaries from selection state (weights_ci + weights_selectfreq).

  • "weights" : aggregates across multiple MB-sPLS fits (means + Wald CIs).

ci_filter

One of c("none","excludes_zero","overlaps_zero").

  • "excludes_zero": keep if (ci_low >= 0 | ci_high <= 0) AND |mean| > 1e-3.

top_n

Integer or NULL. Keep top-N features per blockxcomponent by |mean|.

add_block_rule

Logical; thin rule between block facets (default FALSE; safe implementation).

font

Character; font family (default "sans").

alpha_by_stability

Logical; for source="bootstrap", map bar alpha to selection frequency.

Value

ggplot object (all components facetted in columns)

Contents
